casebody.data: SUCCESSION OF Johnye Mae MADDEN No. 2018-CC-0137 Supreme Court of Louisiana. March 9, 2018 ON WRIT OF CERTIORARI TO THE COURT OF APPEAL, SECOND CIRCUIT, PARISH OF WEBSTER Writ application denied. Crichton, J., would grant and assigns reasons: I would grant this application, order the record and briefing, and docket for oral argument to examine the compelling issues presented under Rule 1.9 of the Louisiana Rules of Professional Conduct.
